meanings.sent1: Her brashness in speaking out of turn often got her in trouble.
meanings.sent2: His brashness in the meeting offended many of his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: Despite his brashness, he managed to charm his way out of the situation.
meanings.sent4: The brashness of his remarks left everyone in the room stunned.
meanings.sent5: The teacher had to address the student's brashness towards classmates.

meanings.definition: Energetic or spirited in a bold, confident way
meanings.sent1: The team's brashness on the field inspired their fans to cheer louder.
meanings.sent2: Her brashness in taking risks paid off with a successful business venture.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's brashness in chasing its tail provided endless entertainment.
meanings.sent4: The brashness of the waves crashing against the shore was invigorating.
meanings.sent5: His brashness in trying new things led to exciting discoveries.
